creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy

provenance: Edith and Norman Garmezy, Edina, MN; Garmezys acquired from C. G. Boerner, New York, in 1989
text: The vibrant energy of Max Beckman's landscape makes clear his interest in the art of Vincent van Gogh. Rich with drypoint burr, this particular impression of Landscape with Balloon was one of sixty sheets pulled before the plate was steel faced.
title: Landschaft mit Ballon (Landscape with Balloon)
